TunableTuple.name: CHEAT_TEXT
TunableTuple.description: Strings to be used for display text on cheat buttons to trigger all adventure moments.

Tunable.name: next_display_text
Tunable.description: Text that will be displayed on next cheat button.

Tunable.name: previous_display_text
Tunable.description: Text that will be displayed on previous cheat button.

Tunable.name: text_pattern
Tunable.description: Format for displaying next and previous buttons text including the progress.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: Tooltip to show when disabling previous or next button.

Tunable.name: LOOT_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
Tunable.description: A string used to recursively build loot notification text. It will be given two tokens: a loot display text string, if any, and the previously built LOOT_NOTIFICATION_TEXT string.

Tunable.name: NOTIFICATION_TEXT
Tunable.description: A string used to format notifications. It will be given two arguments: the notification text and the built version of LOOT_NOTIFICATION_TEXT, if not empty.

TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.
